stimulusHtml: If a permanent magnet is broken in half it forms 2 permanent magnets, each with a north and a south pole. Which of the following justifies this observation?
choicesHtml: Magnetic field lines must form closed loops.
Magnetic fields are caused by moving charged particles.
Magnetic fields are caused by accelerating charged particles.
Magnetic field lines start on a north pole and either end on a south pole or end at infinity.
